content.question: The repetition of the phrase “which they are not” in the first paragraph (sentences 2 and 3) achieves which of the following effects?

choices.label: It reinforces the authors’ overarching claim by reiterating it in increasingly absolute terms.
It previews the passage’s line of reasoning by introducing a comparison that is developed in subsequent paragraphs.
It demonstrates that science depends on accumulating data by listing the observations that lead to the authors’ conclusion.
It justifies the authors’ efforts to define science by emphasizing the flaws of existing definitions.

content.answer: It justifies the authors’ efforts to define science by emphasizing the flaws of existing definitions.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how the organization of a text creates unity and coherence and reflects a line of reasoning.
